sentences.sContent: You can see many kinds of nice flowers everywhere.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can see many kinds of nice flowers everywhere.
sentences.sCn: 到处都可以看到许多种类的美丽鲜花。

sentences.sContent: We saw many kinds of fossils of dinosaurs in the Dinosaur World.
sentences.sContent_eng: We saw many kinds of fossils of dinosaurs in the Dinosaur World.
sentences.sCn: 在恐龙世界我们看到许多种类的恐龙化石。

sentences.sContent: But these days, for many people and many kinds of businesses, those constraints are easy to overcome.
sentences.sContent_eng: But these days, for many people and many kinds of businesses, those constraints are easy to overcome.
sentences.sCn: 但对现在的许多人和许多公司来讲，这些限制都可以轻易地被克服。
